plot: "Follow the Money" the saying goes. This movie takes that saying to heart. Rather than following a story or a character, 20 Spot follows the path of a twenty dollar bill.
title: 20 Spot
plot_es: "Follow the Money" the saying goes. This movie takes that saying to heart. Rather than following a story or a character, 20 Spot follows the path of a twenty dollar bill.
